biotools.summary: A machine-guided pipeline for cryptic pocket discovery in undruggable cancer targets. Combines long MD (100–200 ns), metastable state modeling (MSM), hydration thermodynamics, and PLIP-based interaction analysis to identify mutant-specific pockets absent in wild-type. Validated on TP53, KRAS G12D, MYC mutants, and fusion oncoproteins

bioschemas.name: Beyond Venetoclax Cryptic Pocket Pipeline
